attributes.action: Draft media bill forcing the media to offer balanced, unbiased news and reports.
attributes.additional_details: The BBC is a publicly funded organisation. It should therefore reflect, not only public mood but also offer a balanced view of current affairs and events. It should not be used as a government propaganda tool which I believe it is currently being used as.
attributes.background: The current attacks on Jeremy Corbyn by our main media outlets are a new example of something which has been going on for many years. I believe that the media should be forced to offer balanced views not be free to drag someone's name through the mud for political aims. Bring back an honest press!
